description: From Las Vegas to the world
ushering in a new era of wealth
intro.about: Vegas Foundation is a globally leading innovative financial institution dedicated to providing innovative financial services and asset management solutions for the global casino and gaming industry. The core goal of the foundation is to promote transparency, security, and stable profitability in the gaming industry!
intro.team: The founding team of Vegas Foundation includes globally renowned financial experts and an international professional operations team, committed to delivering high returns to partners and investors through its unique fund management system.

notice: System Announcement: 1. The malicious account collusion intelligent identification and tracing system has been activated; funds-related accounts are scanned in real time, and accounts banned by the system cannot be manually unbanned. 2. Before July 3rd, the Foundation will reward the top 100 community leaders with the highest performance globally with an additional 200,000 USDT (single-month performance of over 2 million within three generations); directly airdropped to the income wallet address. 3. Starting June 10th, the daily return is 2%; meanwhile, a 7-day cycle of 5%, 4%, 3% and a 15-day cycle of 2%, 1% will be activated; 54321 cycle for distributing gambling dividends; generation rewards are: receive 3 generations without direct referral requirements, 5 direct referrals receive 7 generations; 8 direct referrals receive 10 generations; 10 direct referrals receive 12 generations; 15 direct referrals receive 15 generations (automatically activated); while increasing generation rewards, the return is reduced by one level. Happy betting! Vegas Foundation Technical Department 2025.06.10
